pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:4.1: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:5.1: 18. The training rule on complaining about others
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.2: At that time the nun who was a pupil of Bhaddā Kāpilānī attended on her respectfully,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.3: and Bhaddā Kāpilānī said this to the nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.4: “Venerables, this nun is attending on me respectfully. I’ll give her a robe.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.5: Then, because of misunderstanding and lack of proper reflection, that nun criticized the other,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.6: “Venerables, if I didn’t attend on her respectfully, she wouldn’t give me a robe.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.2: “How can a nun criticize someone else because of misunderstanding and lack of proper reflection?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.6: How can a nun criticize someone else because of misunderstanding and lack of proper reflection?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:8.1: ‘If a nun criticizes someone else because of misunderstanding and lack of proper reflection, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:11.1: Because of […] lack of proper reflection:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:12.2: if she criticizes one who is fully ordained, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:13.1: If the other person is fully ordained, and she perceives her as such, and she criticizes her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:13.2: If the other person is fully ordained, but she is unsure if she is, and she criticizes her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:13.3: If the other person is fully ordained, but she does not perceive her as such, and she criticizes her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:14.1: If she criticizes someone who is not fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:14.2: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she perceives her as fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:14.3: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:14.4: If the other person is not fully ordained, and she does not perceive her as fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:15.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:16.1: The eighth training rule is finished.
